    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106266</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106266</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205434</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Puppet Show: Sandow Birk</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Marionette Erscheinen: Sandow Birk</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Exposition de Marionnette : Sandow Birk</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Mostra Do Fantoche: Sandow Birk</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Esposizione Del Puppet: Sandow Birk</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μαριονέτα εμφανίζει: Sandow Birk</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La Demostración De la Marioneta: Sandow 
Birk</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Spark visits painter Sandow Birk and his crew as they finish production on the artist's distinctly contemporary take on Dante's 14th century epic The Divine Comedy -- set in 21th century San Francisco. This Educator Guide is about history painting and storytelling.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funkenbesuche Maler Sandow Birk und seine 
Mannschaft, da sie Produktion auf dem zeitgenössischen Nehmen des 
Künstlers deutlich auf Dantes 14. Jahrhundertepose die göttliche 
Komödie beenden -- stellten in 21. Jahrhundert San Francisco ein. 
Diese Erzieher-Anleitung ist über Geschichte Anstrich und das 
Storytelling.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le peintre Sandow Birk et sien de visites 
d'étincelle servent d'équipier pendant qu'elles terminent la production 
sur le prendre contemporain de l'artiste distinctement la 14ème 
épopée du siècle de Dante le comédie divin -- placez au 21th 
siècle San Francisco. Ce guide d'éducateur est au sujet de la
peinture d'histoire et de storytelling.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O pintor Sandow Birk das visitas da faísca e seu 
grupo porque termina a produção na tomada contemporary do artista 
distintamente epic do século de Dante no 1ô o comedy divine -- 
ajustaram-se no 21th século San Francisco. Esta guia do 
educador é sobre a pintura do history e storytelling.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il pittore Sandow Birk di chiamate della scintilla
e la sua squadra poichè rifiniscono distintamente la produzione 
sull'introito contemporaneo dell'artista sul quattordicesimo epic di 
secolo del Dante la Commedia divine -- si sono regolati nel 21th 
secolo San Francisco. Questa guida dell'educatore è circa la 
pittura di storia e storytelling.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">_ σπινθήρας επίσκεψη ζωγράφος Σανδοω Ψηρκ και του 
πλήρωμα όπως αυτός τελειώνω παραγωγή ο καλλιτέχνης ευδιάκριτα 
σύγχρονος παίρνω επάνω Δαντε 14$ος αιώνας έπος ο θείος κωμωδία 
-- θέτω 21τχ αιώνας Σαν Φρανσίσκο. Αυτός ο οδηγός 
εκπαιδευτικών είναι για την ιστορία που χρωματίζει και poy.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El pintor Sandow Birk de las visitas de la chispa 
y su equipo como acaban la producción en la toma contemporánea del 
artista distintamente en la 14ta epopeya del siglo de Dante la comedia
divina -- fijaron en el 21o siglo San Francisco. Esta guía del 
educador está sobre la pintura de la historia y storytelling.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205434</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
